growthexperiments-help-panel-question-wi: Thumela umbuzo wakho kuDeski Losizo Lomphakathi
growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-su: Zonke iziqephu zendatshana zesithombe ezitholakalayo zanamuhla ziqediwe. Wenze kahle!
Zonke izindatshana zeziphakamiso zesixhumanisi ezitholakalayo zanamuhla ziphelele. Wenze kahle!
Zama olunye uhlobo lokuhlela noma ubuye kusasa ukuze uthole iziphakamiso zezithombe ezengeziwe.
Zama olunye uhlobo lokuhlela noma ubuye kusasa ukuze uthole iziphakamiso zezixhumanisi ezengeziwe.
Abanye abasebenzisi be-{{SITENAME}} bathole izindatshana ezidinga umsebenzi. Qhubeka nokuhlela {{GENDER:|yakho}} ngokuphequlula lokhu kuhlelwa okuphakanyisiwe.
growthexperiments-help-panel-questionrev: Uma uthumela umbuzo, ushicilelwa esidlangalaleni ngaphansi kwegama lakho lomsebenzisi, " $2 ", ku- $1 , lapho omunye umhleli wevolontiya ezozama ukunikeza impendulo phakathi nosuku olulandelayo noma ngaphezulu.
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-su: Umbuzo wemojula yosizo ekhasini eliyisiqalo lomsebenzisi
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-po: Kwenzeke iphutha ngesikhathi uzama ukuthumela umbuzo wakho. Ungazama futhi noma ungavakashela $1 esipheqululini sakho bese wengeza umbuzo wakho mathupha.
growthexperiments-help-panel-suggesteded: Ukuhlela okuphakanyisiwe
Amathiphu okuqala asheshayo
Ulungile? Chofoza okuthi "{{int:vector-view-edit}}" ukuze uqalise.
Ulungile? Vula isigaba ofuna ukusihlela bese uthepha isithonjana sepensela.
Ukufinyelela i-Mercury kusuka<mark class="negative"> Umhlaba</mark> ibeka izinselele zobuchwepheshe ezibalulekile.

Ukwenza umehluko, {{GENDER:|you}} udinga kuphela ukulungisa okukodwa noma okubili okuncane. {{GENDER:|Wena}} awudingi ukusebenza kuso sonke isiqephu sendatshana. {{GENDER:|Wena}} futhi awudingi ukuba nolwazi olukhethekile mayelana nesihloko.
{{GENDER:|Wena}} ungalungisa amaphutha esipelingi nawohlelo lolimi. Lokhu kungase kuhlanganise imisho emide kakhulu, amagama aphindaphindiwe, noma izimpawu zokuloba ezingalungile.
I-Mars<mark class="negative"> unayo</mark> izinyanga ezimbili ezincane.

{{GENDER:|Wena}} ungaphinda ubhale imisho ukuze ingaqukathi imibono. Okuqukethwe kwe-{{SITENAME}} kufanele kungathathi hlangothi, kucace, futhi kuhambisane ne-encyclopedic. Nokho, qaphela ukuthi ungawashintshi amaqiniso emshweni.
I-Jupiter inkulu kakhulu<mark class="negative"> , futhi okuthakazelisa kakhulu,</mark> iplanethi ku-Solar System.
Lo musho uqukethe umbono okufanele ususwe.
Uma u-{{GENDER:|you}} ebona ukulungiswa {{GENDER:|you}} afuna ukukulungisa, chofoza u-" $1 " ukuze uqalise. Bese uqhubeka futhi ulungise izinkinga ngokususa nokuthayipha njengoba kudingeka.

Uma u-{{GENDER:|you}} ebona isilungiso {{GENDER:|you}} afuna ukusenza, thepha ipensela yokuhlela kuleso sigaba ukuze uqalise. Bese uqhubeka futhi ulungise izinkinga ngokususa nokuthayipha njengoba kudingeka.
Thola ezinye izinguquko ongayenza, noma uqhubeke uchofoze okuthi " $1 " ukuze ushicilele ukuhlela okuthi {{GENDER:|yakho}}!
Thola ezinye izinguquko ongayenza, noma uqhubeke uthephe inkinobho yomcibisholo oluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka ukuze ushicilele ukuhlela okuthi {{GENDER:|yakho}}!

Izixhumanisi phakathi kwezindatshana ze-{{SITENAME}} zivumela abafundi ukuthi bachofoze kokuthile abafuna ukufunda kabanzi ngakho. Basiza abantu ukuthi bazulazule kalula baye kwezinye izindatshana ze-{{SITENAME}}.
I-Mercury incane kakhulu<mark class="positive"> iplanethi</mark> kwe<mark class="positive"> Uhlelo lomkhathi</mark> .

Okufanele ukwenze u-{{GENDER:|you}} ukwengeza isixhumanisi esisodwa noma ezimbili ukuze wenze umehluko. {{GENDER:|Wena}} awudingi ukusebenza kuso sonke isiqephu sendatshana. {{GENDER:|Wena}} futhi awudingi ukuba nolwazi olukhethekile mayelana nesihloko.

Landela lezi ziqondiso lapho wengeza izixhumanisi:
* Xhumanisa imiqondo umfundi angase afune ukufunda okwengeziwe ngayo.
* Xhumanisa kuphela lapho lelo gama noma ibinzana livela okokuqala esihlokweni.
* Ungaxhumi emagameni avamile, iminyaka, noma izinsuku.
Inyanga kucatshangwa ukuthi yakhe cishe 4.51 billion<mark class="negative"> iminyaka</mark> edlule.
Igama elithi "iminyaka" akufanele lihlanganiswe, ngoba liyigama elivamile
Uma u-{{GENDER:|you}} ebona ndawana thize ukuze engeze isixhumanisi, chofoza " $1 " ukuze uqalise. Bese ugqamisa igama noma ibinzana ofuna ukulenza libe isixhumanisi.
Uma u-{{GENDER:|you}} ebona ndawana thize ukuze engeze isixhumanisi, thepha ipensela yokuhlela ukuze uqalise. Bese ugqamisa igama noma ibinzana ofuna ukulenza libe isixhumanisi.
IVenus iminyene<mark class="positive"> umkhathi</mark>
